scripts.test:e2e: npm run build && cucumber-js --require dist/cucumber.conf.js --require dist/acceptance/stepDefinitions/**/*.js --format @cucumber/pretty-formatter
scripts.test:normal: npm run build && cucumber-js --require dist/cucumber.conf.js --require dist/acceptance/stepDefinitions/**/*.js --format @cucumber/pretty-formatter acceptance/features/*.feature
scripts.test:all: npm run build && cucumber-js --require dist/cucumber.conf.js --require dist/acceptance/stepDefinitions/**/*.js -f json:cucumber_report.json --publish-quiet acceptance/features/*.feature
